SEARCH
Package inf101.grid

Class Location

java.lang.Object
inf101.grid.Location
public class Location extends Object
This class represents a Location on a grid. That means indices for row and column.
Author:
Martin Vatshelle - martin.vatshelle@uib.no

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Location(int row, int col)
    Constructor for location, note that a Location is independent of the Grid implementation, hence can have values not corresponding to a cell in the grid.

    • gridDistanceTo

      public int gridDistanceTo(Location loc)
      Returns the Manhattan distance between 2 locations. That is the shortest distance distance between two points if you can only go East,West,North and South (not diagonally)
      Parameters:
      loc -
      Returns:
